column1: '''''anna''''' is a noun meaning "gift" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>

left]]''Anna'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-third letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  It is the third letter of the sixth grade or [[Tyellë]], which contains "semi-vocalic" consonants and it is the fifth letter in the third series of consonants.  This letter is commonly used for consonantal '''Y''',<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}</ref> except in the [[Mode of Beleriand]].  As seen in the [[West-gate]] of [[Moria]] inscription, ''Anna'' in this "full writing" mode is used for '''O'''.<ref>{{FR
column4: II4}}</ref>  The [[Westron]] name for this letter is '''''Yé'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
